Name: Mihail
description:
Mihail thanks Kiva lenders for the previous loan, which has helped him to build a new stable for a horse. Due to this, he was able to raise more animals. At the moment Mihail raises a horse, 3 pigs, a cow, cattle, 30 rabbits and 30 poultry. Also he processes 1.5 ha of land and grows corn and alfalfa for animal feed.

This year Mihail wants to rebuild the stable for cattle, which is why he is requesting a new loan. This loan will help Mihail to rebuild the stable. As a result, he will be able to earn income to support his big family.
